TopicTitle: Gold Stingray Inc. Spacecraft Division [New: Cygnus, Azure Kite, Azure Orca]

Articles.Content:
Welcome to the corporation.

Thanks.

Mach 2 is just over 680 m/s.

I, personally, am looking for a large, stable plane that can handle low speeds well - reaching a high speed is not necessary. It should be able to hold some small parts on the underside of the fuselage or wings - use radial decouplers for this, they\'re almost exactly the same as the mod part I want to use.

Hmm, might get working on that.

Hello, co-workers! I have a question: Does Gold Stingray have a VAB division? I am personally not very good at spaceplanes but I am successful building upright spaceships in the VAB. Just a suggestion.....
I\'ll add it.
Thanks
No problem. I can\'t wait to see what new designs y\'all come out with. :3

The two attached rockets are part of the Plaatinum NOSTALGIAseries. The 'KSC Sol' is a rocket that, if time warp is on for long enough, will pass the mun, minmus, and then start orbiting the sun: Kerbol. The KSC Galaxy can do the same (probably) but is meant for orbit of Kerbin.

Required Addons: NovaPunch Remix Pack (newest version)

Also attached are two screenshots of the KSC Sol.

Made by Plaatinum Starships, a division of Plaatinum Aerospace Technologies, and a proud member of Gold Stingray Inc.

Edit: Katurn V officially renamed to 'KSC Galaxy'
May I suggest a new name for the Katurn V? That name\'s been used... too many times to count. Along with the K-prefix. >.<
can\'t change the downloadable .craft file, but I can change the name on the post

And I\'m BACK with a new spacecraft! The attached .craft file is the PlaatinumPROBE 1. A space probe to explore the Kerbol System! Leave stages 0-2 intact because that is the 'probe'.

Required Addons: Novapunch Remix Pack (newest version)

Made by Plaatinum Starships, a division of Plaatinum Aerospace Technologies, and a proud member of Gold Stingray Inc.

Also attached are VAB pictures
You tell me the names and I can edit them into the game with Notepad.

My three rockets are:

KSC Sol

KSC Galaxy

PlaatinumPROBE 1
Kk. Thanks for all the work.
as long as I make spaceships I\'m happy! ;D
Hey, can you quickly get a picture of each of the rockets taking off? I\'d like it if all of the rocket\'s inside the pic, too.
Weegeebrah, SIGN ME UP. I\'ll be focusing on un-orthodox aircraft and spacecraft.
Welcome to the crew!

@luigibro: will do ASAP

@iamwearingpants: Welcome!

Oops, I realized that the 'KSC Galaxy' (.craft called Katurn V) must not have saved correctly, so the new full craft will be attached to this post as 'KSC Kerbcury'

P.S. @luigibro: your pics will also be attached.

Screenshot 14-15 is the KSC Galaxy

Screenshot 16-17 is the KSC Sol

Screenshot 18-19 is the PlaatinumPROBE 1
I was wondering if it could be possible for you to make a plane that is easy to control, goes up too 300m/s and maneuvers fairly well, if you could that would be great. thanks in advance.

@krymnox: I\'m sure we can do that, but I personally am part of the VAB Division, (and I\'m not very good at building spaceplanes), but if you ask any of the other guys (luigibro606, shhilent, etc.) I\'m sure they will take your order.Sorry that I cannot build your spacecraft!

Plaatinum Aerospace Technologies

I would highly enjoy a long-range transport aircraft, capable of crossing the Eastern Ocean (the ocean directly in front of the runway) with a payload of five (5) or more Mk.1 fuel tanks. Speed and altitude are irrelevant.

@ Phoenix Aerospace: I will try my best. If I am unsuccessful, then please ask one of the other employees or luigibro606. This is because I work in the VAB Division but I will still try.

Thanks for choosing Gold Stingray!

Plaatinum Aerospace Technologies
I wasn\'t specifically addressing you, but okay! Best of luck!

I have an idea all workers including me Will try to make a ship faster then the fastest earth ship witch I believe go pass sound berries 9 times if anyone is successful post it also if you know a faster plane tell us and that will be our new goal

@Phoenix Aerospace: Alas, I was unsuccessful, but I\'m sure one of the others would make it the airplane of your dreams. All the pilots of the Phoenix HeavyCarrier where killed in test launches.

@deadly654321: Great Idea! Mach 9, prepare to be SHATTERED!
